list.name: CLONE-PROJECTOR
list.description: Leon creates an illusion of himself to confuse his enemies.
list.descriptionHtml: Leon creates an illusion of himself to confuse his enemies.

list.name: LOLLIPOP-DROP
list.description: Leon creates a stealthy area for his team to hide in. The lollipop slowly loses its health over time.
list.descriptionHtml: Leon creates a stealthy area for his team to hide in. The lollipop slowly loses its health over time.
